block.oc2.computer.desc: Ues Scrench or compatibel wrench 2 add an remoev componentz.
block.oc2.bus_cable.desc: usd in combinashun wif Bus interfacez 2 connect external devicez 2 computerz.
block.oc2.charger.desc: chargez entities an itemz in contaneers on top ov it.
block.oc2.creative_energy.desc: providez unlimited energy 2 adjacent blockz. intendd 4 testin.
item.oc2.wrench.desc: usd 2 configuer devicez an 2 dismantel dem (whiel sneaking).
item.oc2.bus_interface.desc: usd 2 attach Bus cablez 2 external devicez.
item.oc2.file_import_export_card.desc: providez an AIP 2 import an export filez inot an out ov vurtual computr frum an inot ur real fiel sistem.
item.oc2.robot.desc: Ues Scrench or compatibel wrench 2 add an remoev componentz.
item.oc2.inventory_operations_module.des: enablez robots 2 moov itemz in, inot an out ov dem inventowee.
item.oc2.block_operations_module.desc: enablez robots 2 break an plaec blockz.
gui.oc2.computer.capture_input.desc: When enabld, as long as teh moues cursor iz hoverin teh terminal contentz, all input will bees capturd, includin teh escaep key.
gui.oc2.computer.power.desc: Toggles teh powr staet ov teh computr.
message.oc2.connector.error.obstructed: No clear lien ov siet tween connectors.
tooltip.oc2.flash_memory_missing: flash mems contaneing firmwaer iz requird 2 boot.
tooltip.oc2.memory_missing: sum mems iz requird 2 load teh flash mems 4 execution 2 boot.
tooltip.oc2.hard_drive_missing: Most systems will requier root fiel sistem 2 boot.
